content.content: Bad enough you have to drag your rag and bones up before the sun,
but you can't afford to fall asleep.
You can't remember the day EV came to town.
The chalkboard was poorly cleaned over the weekend.
Just drop dead at stranger danger,
What's the deal with these letters?
Well it says "You are cordially invited",
so I think it might be an invitation.
but why did we get invited?
I know that creep hanson kid got one,
but he likes to tell everyone how "connected" he is.
I think I saw Shaun ranting about it earlier,
but honestly there's always a fifty -
fifty chance some "imperialist pigs" will set him off.

answers.content: third option, my brain is still waking up.

content.content: It would be weird if they didn't.
it can't be that big a deal.
JOHN WICK IS AN OVERRATED MOVIE!
but shock commentary was the only way to get your attention.
I would like to introduce you all to our new student.
Just stand here at the front where everyone can see you.
Do you have any interests you want to share?
I'll have you know I won the California State Championship for Typing in High School!
It was a constant haze of running and hiding from the lesser evolved cro-magnon alpha males.
Incidentally most of them went on to have successful political careers.
replacing the question with something more contextual
MC meets Harlequin through the bitcoin miner
The Emancipation Proclamation was an executive order from President Lincoln in 1863.
It was a document that abolished slavery in all Confederate states,
not any Union states that were on his side but still practiced slavery.
Although one thing was clear — the war was now about slavery as well.
And since this made the Confederacy look like direct supporters of slavery,
it also dramatically swayed foreign nations' towards the Union.
do you realize how many lockers Mr.
Johnson got stuffed in to teach us history?
this is an easy one and therefore everyone will judge you if you answer wrong.
Why did Lincoln give the Emancipation Proclamation?
Boosting Union morale to fight (Correct) OR Reducing the numbers of the Confederate Army
It gave the people in the Union hope.
They wanted the fighting to stop,
and the document inspired them to fight not only for reunification,
no more pushing people in front of moving objects.
he was playing a video game!
I'm a public school teacher in America.
The only thing I can care about are the results.
sorry for throwing you under the bus out there…
I didn't realize I was in the presence of some multitasking wizard.
I won't get on your case like that again.
somedays I wonder why I stick with this job.
I try to sink down into my chair as my face gets warmer and I feel the redness in my cheeks.
I look to my left and I see June Hanenburg,
who looks at me victoriously but trying to hide a bit of guilt.
Johnson continues his lecture and I look straight forward for the rest of class,
too embarrassed to see the class's reaction.
You should really take more interest in history.
You know people actually died to make it happen.
*sigh* But I guess it's not for everyone.
You kinda threw me under the bus there.
I try to fake a smile but I feel too awkward and dash out of there.
Gift cards are currency in the same way cash is,
therefore I should not have to tell someone when I pay with one.
You're paying less because the gift card isn't your money.
You should tell them about the gift card and pay half of the difference.
Who's money would it be then?
you didn't earn it so it's not yours.
She catches my not so subtle eavesdropping.
they were being quite loud and I wasn't the only one who turned to see the spectacle.
if you are paying with a gift card,
it's not like you are paying with your own      money...
He heard the whole thing and he agrees.
That's completely unbiased and you know it.
You just aren't seeing this logically.
I didn't mean for him to get mad like that,
I just thought you were right.
the girl looks directly at me to speak.
he always pouts when I'm right.
Suddenly I realize that I only have forty-five seconds to make it to the gym before P.E.
starts since I stopped to chat.
I quickly head in the direction of the gym.
I always thought gift cards were basically like cash...
Thanks for the reminder once again,
It was just a friendly argument,
I just happened to be right.
Elizabeth rolls her eyes and walks away.
I feel a little guilty for escalating the situation.
I'm sorry if I made things worse,
I just thought you were right.
The boy waves dismissively and readjusts his glasses.
I just didn't realize it was such a hot topic of debate.
(It didn't seem like the other girl took that situation very well.
I might have to apologize for what I did…).
I check the time to see I only have forty-five seconds for P.E..
I speed-walk down the school halls as fast as I can.
Ged your scrawny ass down here before I make the entire lot of you run suicides till the bell!
For the love of god Simon,
You feel your heart sink and the blood in your body grind to a halt.
You hurry to the locker room and,
despite the layers of concrete separating you from the class,
you feel their stares and the threats of violence they make if you don't hurry.
You stash your things in your locker and change into your gym clothes.
The miner buzzes and you curse for the trouble it's caused.
Today's words of wisdom are from Machiavelli.
"It's better to be feared than loved." You best remember that,
Man whore is not an acceptable profession.
You can't say we if you're not actually one of them.
I get to choose how and whom I spend my nights.
you know what your problem is.
I set back the Chad rights movement every other night.
you're letting everyone else tell you how you should be.
What kind of person do you want me to be?
Harlequin attempts to remove MC from server
Remaining balance: [INSERT HOW MUCH MC EARNED MINING]
I forgot to get a drink.
I walk over to a vending machine and swipe my credit card.
A soda pops out and my phone pings with a notification…
my phone must be acting up.
It says my available balance now has thousands of dollars in there!
I should call the bank later,
I scan the tables but can't recognize anyone from earlier.
and one with a girl who looks zoned out.
I've got some mining to do anyway…
I decide to have some privacy today and pull out the Miner.
(Did I forgot to pack one today?
I could have sworn there was a sandwich.)
She smiles with a mischievous look.
She seemed to think about how she was going to answer that.
thanks for picking it up for me,
It was very nice meeting you.
She walks away and I can't help but feel a little confused.
(Guess I should eat this sandwich before it's "dropped" again…)
(Looks like she could use a friend.)
I plop down in the red chair beside her.
You looked like you could use some company.
She smiles sweetly at the gesture.
How did you know my name?
We have a History class together.
I won't be offended if you don't remember.
I'm just glad we've met now.
do you mind if I play my game here?
We can still talk if you want
I just moved into this area recently.
Not many people have actually wanted to talk to me.
Guess I just give off bad vibes or something.
I think my parents would say that about me too.
at least I've made one friend,
I think we're going to be great friends!
(if you need more of this let me know)
I think it's time to get going.
It was nice talking to you,
We have nothing here as of now
To work with the smart kids.
Come on man back me up here.
why are you accusing me of cheating?
Because someone that skips school shouldn't do better than me!
